name: Soultower
description:
Soultower is a roguelike platformer where a lost soul must climb a tower to gain another chance of living again.

Possess enemies to use their skills against themselves, throw enemies at each other disposing of their bodies and talk with the warm guide of the tower Fatuu.

Controls:

Joystick  or Arrows to move.

RT or Space Bar to possess or unpossess enemies

Button A or Z key to jump while in enemy form

Button B or X key to attack while in enemy form

Xbox Gamepad supported!

Esc to pause game and cancel.

Game created by:

Rocío (@ftalocianina) - General Art and Animations

Sergio (@esercante_) - Animations

Alex (@alexbenetmusic) - Sound and Music

David (@davidpixel) - Code and design

Please note that...

  • Soultower is a small game done in free time and originally started for devtober. For that reason it is a short game that might contain some bugs.
  • If you find any problem do not hesitate to leave a comment. Thanks!
